--- In nbwrpg@y..., aerosmith60@c... wrote:
> HYdras yelled our with a roar. Almost felt like a shock wave left
his mouth 
> with the scream. A ball of fire burst from him and dissipated a few
inches 
> away from him.."All who are loyal let us go back to Megaton's base.
We will 
> figure out what to do about the other ship there."

"As you command, royalty" Inferno replied. He was still poundering
what could have caused this fusion. He had never seen anything like it
exept for when Megatron fused his spark with the origional Megatron in
the ark. As well as the fused for of Optimus Prime and the maximal
leader. 

Inside Megatron's base Quickstrike was done in the CR Tank. He exited
and glanced around him "Looks like the new Megs isn't back yet hehe,
that should give me time for alittle nap" He walked to the storage bay
and converted back to his beast mode.

Waspinator's repairs were about half done.
